debufftracker.main module¶

class debufftracker.main.ConfigReader¶

Bases: object

This class contains functions to read and return configuration Data

get_debuff_configs(status_type)¶
get_imagetransformation_config()¶
class debufftracker.main.ScreenTracker¶

Bases: object

This class contains functions to track the screen content

create_removestatus_dict()¶

Iterates over each status type in [“ailment”, “curse”, “ground”] and adds the status specific config to dictionary relevant_dicts. Then return relevant dict :return: relevant_dicts, a dictionary with status configs. :rtype: Dictionary

create_status_instances()¶

Create instances of status.Status and add them to a dictionary self.__status_instances. Using this dictionary enables managing those instances, when necessary

Returns

None

grab_transform_screen()¶

Make a partial Screenshot, transform to screenshot to numpy array and return transformed screenshot.

Returns

screen_cv2, partial screenshot that contains all 3 color channels. Order is BGR

Return type

np.array

manage_status_instances()¶

Takes a partial screenshot, then iterates over the status.Status instances and checks if a harmful effect of type of instance was found. If so, remove the effect. Threads will be joined to prevent chaotic behaviour.

Returns

debuffs_dict, a dict that contains the negative effect and a dt stamp when it was recognized

Return type

Dictionary

run()¶

Infinitive loop that calls self.manage_status_instances() which causes any found negative effects to be removed.

Returns

None

debufftracker.status module¶

class debufftracker.status.Status(config)¶

Bases: object

check_ailment(current_screen, show_match=False)¶

Checks if the ailment type of this class was found

Parameters

  • current_screen (np.array) – Screenshot of current game sequence

  • show_match (Boolean) – Parameter to force show a match. Only for debugging purposes

Returns

True of ailment was found, False if not.

Return type

Boolean

perform_action()¶

Returns True / False wether or not the flask_key was pressed

Returns

if flask_key was pressed

Return type

Boolean

run(current_screen)¶

Causes the the effect check to run and removes effect if it exists

Parameters

current_screen (np.array) – partial screenshot of upper left area

Returns

empty dict if no action, action_dict if debuff was removed

Return type

dict
